      • getEnableDisableToggleConfirmationText

        public java.lang.String getEnableDisableToggleConfirmationText()
        Invoking updateValidationInfo will update the ValidationInfo cache, which will be referenced throughout the toggleEnableOrDisableSelectedVersion workflow Returns the confirmation text for the EnableDisableToggle button depending on the current Available to Run flag. If the rule version is Enabled then the confirmation text shows "disabled". If the rule version is Disabled then the confirmation text shows "enabled".

      • getEnableDisableToggleLabel

        public java.lang.String getEnableDisableToggleLabel()
        Returns the label for the EnableDisableToggle button depending on the current Available to Run flag. If the rule version is Enabled then the button label is "Disabled". If the rule version is Disabled then the button label is "Enabled".

      • isEnableDisableToggleVisible

        public boolean isEnableDisableToggleVisible()

      • toggleEnableOrDisableSelectedVersion

        public void toggleEnableOrDisableSelectedVersion()
        Toggles the Available To Run flag of the selected rule version after creating a new draft rule version. The rule version is left in draft status if it is not a deployed version, otherwise if rule version is a deployed version it will be promoted to a new deployed version
